item.name: What's Simultaneous Vi Mode?
item.appendix: Push S and D keys simultaneously and keep them pressing.
Then you can use Vi style navigation by HJKL.

block.autogen: --KeyToKey-- KeyCode::J, ModifierFlag::EXTRA4, KeyCode::CURSOR_LEFT, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::L, ModifierFlag::EXTRA4, KeyCode::CURSOR_RIGHT, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::J, ModifierFlag::EXTRA5, KeyCode::CURSOR_LEFT, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::L, ModifierFlag::EXTRA5, KeyCode::CURSOR_RIGHT, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L
--KeyOverlaidModifier-- KeyCode::TAB, KeyCode::COMMAND_L, ModifierFlag::EXTRA2, KeyCode::TAB, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L, KeyCode::SHIFT_L
--KeyOverlaidModifier-- KeyCode::Q, KeyCode::COMMAND_L, ModifierFlag::EXTRA2, KeyCode::TAB, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L, KeyCode::RETURN, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::J, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L, KeyCode::A, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::P
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::L, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L, KeyCode::A, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::N

item.name: Single Key Press Space turns on "Simultaneous Vi Mode"
[Option] A to Shift
item.appendix: (+ When you press A only send Control+S)

item.name: [Option] S to Control
item.appendix: (+ When you press S only send Command+X)

item.name: [Option] D to Option
item.appendix: (+ When you press D only send Command+C)

item.name: [Option] F to Command
item.appendix: (+ When you press F only send Command+V)

item.name: [Option] U/O to Delete/Space
item.appendix: + when you keep U pressed and press O it sends Forward_Delete
+ when you keep O pressed and press U it sends Space+Left

item.name: Simultaneous Key Presses [S+D] turns on "Simultaneous Vi Mode"
Simultaneous Key Presses [Q+W] turns on "Simultaneous Vi Mode"
Simultaneous Key Presses [W+E] turns on "Simultaneous Vi Mode"
Simultaneous Key Presses [Command_L+Space] turns on "Simultaneous Vi Mode"
Single Key Press (`) turns on "Simultaneous Vi Mode"
Single Key Press (`) toggles on "Simultaneous Vi Mode"
Single Key Press Uk Section turns on "Simultaneous Vi Mode"
Single Key Press Space turns on "Simultaneous Vi Mode"
item.appendix: (+ When you type Space only, send Space) + [KeyRepeat]

item.name: Single Key Press Space turns on "Simultaneous Vi Mode"
item.appendix: (+ When you type Space only, send Space)

item.name: [Option] Scroll with mouse movement while in vi mode
[Option] Tab turns on Manage Mode
item.appendix: - + when you press Tab only, Alt+Tab+Return (Witch Previous Window/App)

item.name: [Option] Q turns on Manage Mode
item.appendix: - + when you press Q only, send Next App

item.name: [Option] Y, U, O to Command_L + X, C, V
item.appendix: For Cut, Copy, Paste with Y, U, O

item.name: [Option] Section(§) to Shift L
item.appendix: This option becomes more convenient by
using with "For UK Keyboard users > Section(§) to LeftClick".
That changes section key to mouse click.
This is also in the place of the Caps Lock.
It makes sense then use the mouse click to select text
and is also more comfortable when using [Q+W]

item.name: [Option] S to Shift_L
item.appendix: // So, we cannot press Q+W+S or W+E+S at the same time.
// If you have high-end keyboards, you can use this option with [Q+W] or [W+E]

item.name: [Option] U/O to Backspace/Delete
item.appendix: (+ When you press Control+U/O send Cmd+Z/Cmd+Shift+Z)

item.name: [Option] Y/[ to Command+Option+Control+U/[
item.appendix: (It's useful using these shortcuts to move focus to Menu Bar and Status Menus)

item.name: [Option] §/= to Command+Option+Control+U/[
item.appendix: (It's useful using these shortcuts to move focus to Menu Bar and Status Menus)

item.name: [Option] U to Delete
item.appendix: + when you keep U pressed and press L(right) it sends Forward_Delete

item.name: [Option] O to Space
item.appendix: + when you keep O pressed and press J(left) it sends Space_Back
